lead_paragraph: In an April 2007 letter, Powell H. Skipper, who oversaw the Martin Correctional Institution in Indiantown, Fla., recommended that Mr. Mateen be dismissed from the officer training program. Mr. Skipper cited examples of Mr. Mateen making unsettling comments about bringing a gun to school, sleeping in class and being absent without permission.
